Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Radiopharmaceutical Compound/Radioimmunoconjugate/Yttrium Y 90 Monoclonal Antibody Hu3S193
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A radioimmunotherapeutic agent consisting of a humanized murine monoclonal antibody (hu3S193) directed against the tumor-associated Lewis Y epithelial antigen chelated to the radioisotope yttrium-90. Yttrium Y 90 monoclonal antibody Hu3S193 binds to Lewis Y epithelial antigen-expressing tumor cells, selectively delivering a cytotoxic dose of beta radiation. (NCI04)
